rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {CSE2304, FIT2004} AND  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {CSE2303, FIT2014} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS})

description: This unit covers fundamental techniques in image processing. Topics include image representation and enhancement, thresholding, image algebra, neighbourhood operations on images, Fourier methods, edge detection, feature extraction and representation, shape, texture, segmentation, classification, restoration, image compression, and colour and multiband image processing.
